instruction: Select the best website font from the 3 options given and provide a brief explanation for your choice.
output: I would choose Montserrat as the best website font option. Montserrat is a modern sans serif font with a clean look, great legibility, and a contemporary feel. It is also uniquely versatile and can be used for both body and headings. Furthermore, it is compatible with most web browsers which makes it ideal for a website font.
